title: RRB Group D Recruitment 2026
description:
Event	Date
Notification (Short Notice)	December 2025 (issued)
Online Application Start	31 January 2026
Last Date to Apply	2 March 2026 (23:59 hrs)
Exam Date	Will be announced later
Admit Card Release	A few days before exam date

Note: The application window was postponed from the earlier date (21 Jan ‚Äì 20 Feb) to the revised schedule above.

üéì Eligibility Criteria

Educational Qualification

10th Pass (Matriculation) from a recognised board OR

ITI qualification / National Apprenticeship Certificate (NAC) from NCVT/SCVT (varies by post).
(This is the expected/reported criteria ‚Äî always confirm with the detailed official notification when available.)

Age Limit

Minimum: 18 years

Maximum: ~33 years (as of 01.01.2026)

Age Relaxation: Applicable as per Govt rules (OBC/SC/ST/PwBD, etc.).

Nationality:

Only Indian citizens (or as specified in official notification) are eligible.

üìã Selection Process

Computer Based Test (CBT) ‚Äì Single stage online written test.

Physical Efficiency Test (PET) ‚Äì For candidates clearing CBT.

Document Verification (DV).

Medical Examination.

The detailed pattern (subjects/questions/marks) will be in the official full notification.

üí∞ Pay & Benefits

Starting Salary: Around ‚Çπ18,000 per month + allowances (approx). (Based on reports/trends; check official notification for exact pay scale.)

Government job benefits: PF/Gratuity, pension benefits (as per rules), transfers, promotions, etc.

üìù Application Fee

General/OBC/EWS: ~‚Çπ500 (partially refundable after CBT).

SC/ST/PwBD/Women/Transgender: ~‚Çπ250 (usually refundable after CBT).
(This is as reported; check official notification for exact fee and refund details.)

üìå How to Apply

Visit the official RRB website(s) or the centralized RRB application portal (like rrbapply.gov.in).

Read the full official notification (CEN 09/2025) carefully.

Fill the online application form with accurate details.

Upload required documents (photo, signature, certificates).

Pay fee (if applicable).

Submit before 2 March 2026, 23:59.

üìç Current Status (Jan 2026)

The admit card for the RRB Group D exam has started releasing for candidates whose exam is scheduled early February 2026.

Application process is ongoing for many candidates to complete by the revised deadline.

‚úÖ Tips Before You Apply

Ensure Aadhaar details (name, DOB, photo) match your Class 10 certificate ‚Äî required for verification.

Keep scanned copies of certificates ready.

Apply well before the deadline to avoid last-minute issues..

The selection process includes a Computer Based Test (CBT), followed by a Physical Efficiency Test (PET). Candidates who qualify PET will be called for Document Verification and Medical Examination. Final selection will be based on merit and fulfillment of eligibility criteria as prescribed by RRB.

Candidates are advised to carefully read the official notification before applying and ensure that they meet all eligibility conditions related to age, education and medical standards.

--------------------------------------

title: Indian Air Force Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2027 Recruitment
description:
Indian Air Force has officially released the recruitment notification for Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2027 under the Agnipath Scheme. This recruitment is conducted to enroll young and motivated candidates into the Indian Air Force for a service period of four years.

The selection process includes an online written examination, Physical Fitness Test (PFT), Adaptability Tests and Medical Examination. Selected candidates will receive monthly salary, allowances and a Seva Nidhi package after completion of service tenure.

Applicants are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying to understand eligibility conditions, physical standards and selection rules.

--------------------------------------

title: RBI Office Assistant Recruitment 2026
description:
Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has released the Office Assistant recruitment notification for 2026. This recruitment provides an excellent opportunity to work in India's central banking institution.

The selection process generally includes a written examination, interview and document verification. Selected candidates will receive an attractive salary, job security and other government benefits.

--------------------------------------

title: PSSSB Group D Recruitment 2026
description:
Punjab Subordinate Services Selection Board (PSSSB) has released Group D recruitment notification for various departments of Punjab Government.

The selection process includes a written examination followed by document verification. Knowledge of Punjabi language is mandatory.

--------------------------------------
